name.baseName: Fattening pig production ; feed growing process
育肥猪生产 ; 饲料种植过程

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The energy consumption involved in crop cultivation is mainly the fuel consumption of agricultural machinery during fertilization, weeding and harvesting. According to the research of Huang Hu et al., the average fuel consumption (diesel) of agricultural machinery was 56.25 L·hm-2 between fixed path conservation tillage and non-fixed path conservation tillage. The combustion value of diesel oil is 9 800 kcal·kg-1, and the density of diesel oil is 0.85 kg·L-1. Therefore, burning 1 L of diesel can release 8 330 kcal heat, 1 kcal can be converted to 4.2 kJ, then burning 1 L of diesel can produce 34.99 MJ energy.

作物种植过程中涉及到的能源消耗主要为施肥、 除草以及收割过程中农用机械的油耗。根据黄虎等的 研究，农机油耗（柴油）取固定道保护性耕作与非固定 道保护性耕作的平均值 56.25 L·hm-2。柴油的燃烧 值是 9 800 kcal·kg-1，柴油的密度是 0.85 kg·L-1。因此 燃烧 1 L 柴油可释放 8 330 kcal 的热量，1 kcal 可以 换算为 4.2 kJ，则燃烧 1 L 柴油可产生 34.99 MJ 能量。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The evaluation unit was 1000 fattening pigs

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: The yield per hectare of corn, soybean and wheat in Liaoning Province in 2010 was respectively
辽宁省2010年玉米、大豆和小麦每公顷产量分别为······

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The yield per hectare of corn, soybean and wheat in Liaoning Province in 2010 was ··
辽宁省 2010 年玉米、大豆和小麦每公顷产量分 别为 ···

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The evaluation includes: gas emissions from the use of agricultural machinery for fuel consumption
评价内容包括：使用农用机械油耗所产生的气体排放
technology.technologicalApplicability: The industrial process described is primarily used in the agricultural sector for the production of fattening pigs. This encompasses crop cultivation for feed, where energy consumption is a key factor during the operations of fertilization, weeding, and harvesting with agricultural machinery. The use of diesel for agricultural machinery is also captured to provide insights on gas emissions that contribute to global warming, environmental acidification, and eutrophication. The data is relevant for agricultural production analysis and environmental impact assessments in pig farming operations.
所描述的工业流程主要用于农业领域的育肥猪生产。这包括用于饲料的作物种植，其中能源消耗在施肥、除草和收割期间的农用机械操作中是一个关键因素。同时，农用机械柴油的使用也被纳入，以提供对全球变暖、环境酸化和富营养化有贡献的气体排放的见解。这些数据对于农业生产分析和猪场运营的环境影响评估具有相关性。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this paper were collected from 36 large-scale chemical fattening pig farms in Liaoning province. The potential impacts of global warming, environmental acidification and eutrophication in the process of fattening pig production were calculated with reference to the relevant data provided by Liaoning Statistical Yearbook.
本文数据来自辽宁省36家规模化育肥猪养殖场调查；并参照《辽宁统计年鉴》提供的相关数据计算出育 肥猪生产过程中全球变暖、环境酸化和富营养化的影 响潜力。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 刘鸣达, 赵妍, 刘显军, & 王耀晶. 辽宁省育肥猪生产环境影响的生命周期评价. 农业环境科学学报 31, 1250–1255 (2012).
刘鸣达, 赵妍, 刘显军, & 王耀晶. 辽宁省育肥猪生产环境影响的生命周期评价. 农业环境科学学报 31, 1250–1255 (2012).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using the provided data set, researchers and practitioners should take note of the specific methodologies used for calculating environmental impacts. Careful consideration of the unit of analysis (per 1000 fattening pigs released) is critical. The fuel consumption values from agricultural machinery should be included in the total energy consumption analysis. Users should convert energy units appropriately when integrating into broader LCA frameworks, and ensure that gas emissions resulting from fuel consumption are adequately accounted for in impact potential calculations.
在使用所提供的数据集时，研究人员和从业者应注意用于计算环境影响的具体方法论。对分析单位（每1000头出栏育肥猪）的仔细考虑至关重要。应将农用机械的燃油消耗值纳入总能源消耗分析。在将数据集成入更广泛的生命周期评估框架时，用户应适当转换能量单位，并确保在影响潜力计算中充分计入燃料消耗产生的气体排放。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
